home.heading: I am Osama, a full-stack web developer.

body.content: Assalamu Alaikum! My name is Osama Mohammed AlQudah (or BasicPixel), and I am a 16-year-old self-taught full-stack web developer from Jordan.
I am experienced in both front-end and back-end web development, using modern web frameworks and libraries, such as React, Next.js, Django, Tailwind CSS, and more.
My first experience with programming was late 2020 during lockdown, by first taking Harvard's CS50, then CS50's Web track.
I am actively learning and working on new projects. Currently learning mobile development with Flutter.
Recently, I started writing blog posts and tutorials on dev.to as a hobby.

projects.name: bloggr
projects.desc: a blog where anyone can post anonymously with simplicity and power, supports markdown.

projects.name: typistt
projects.desc: Simple typing practice / test website with different modes and settings

projects.name: marknote
projects.desc: (Currently offline) A minimalistic markdown note-taking application. Made as a CS50 Web Final Project.

projects.name: task50
projects.desc: a simple and elegant temporary to-do list. My first ever project.

projects.name: py-yt-downloader
projects.desc: Python CLI / GUI YouTube downloader. supports both videos and playlists.

projects.name: django-commerce
projects.desc: Fake e-commerce website made with Django. Made for CS50 Web 2020 week 4.

projects.name: django-mail
projects.desc: Django fake mail client. Made for CS50 Web 2020 week 6

projects.name: mdwiki
projects.desc: Django wikipedia-like website with Markdown support. Made for CS50 Web 2020 week 3

contact.info: For any purposes, you can reach me at my email, Twitter, or on Telegram, which I am most active on.
